title: Collaborative Instructional Design Process for Integrating Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Language Education Experience
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment enhancing information evaluation and utilization skills for corporate language education managers.

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate reliable materials from complex information sources.
Learners can design project proposals integrating information literacy elements into language education curricula.
Learners can develop information-based educational content through collaboration with peers and librarians.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
